name: Hiro and the Time Light
description:
Made at the 10th Santa Maria Game Jam, this game follows the proposed theme: "Discovery".  Get into the skin of Hiro, a boy that lost himself into a deep dungeon and needs to discover the exit before his lantern's light expires.

If you want to know more about how the game was made visit the GitHub repository:

https://github.com/rgferrari/Game-Jam-10
